review_data.title: Non proprio genuino
review_data.content: Prodotti scadenti ....pane congelato e riscaldato...la pizza fa veramente pena......nonostante fatta da italiani....è una vergogna..

review_data.title: Gute Qualität, aber...
review_data.content: Qualitativ gibt es im Wüst nichts zu mäkeln. Sowohl die Backwaren als auch die Suppen und Salate sind qualitativ top....More

review_data.title: Lovely food!
review_data.content: Stopped by as we were after a small snack after dinner and was not dissapointed. Lovely food and friendly staff.

review_data.title: Nice place for a quick snack or coffee
review_data.content: We drunk there a coffee but there are plenty of choises to grab something to eat. The staff was really helpful and multilingual. Very helpful. There were young people hanging around but also families having breakfast. I could go back.

review_data.title: Super helpful staff
review_data.content: Our hotel desk staff recommended this little cafe for a light lunch and it delivered. The friendly face at the register had a good command of English as we know no German and helped me order the barley soup which was delicious! Husband had the...More

review_data.title: Best breakfast in Zurich
review_data.content: We a group of 10 ladies would have breakfast here everyday for our 5 day visit . Loved the location , excellent service and definitely the best baked breads in Zurich. Thank you

review_data.title: Perfect for a quick snack or lunch
review_data.content: We enjoyed two separate snacks at Wust. Their pastries were delicious and they had a fairly good variety of lunch options. It was a very convenient place to stop during the day. Although it was busy during one of our stops, we received quick service.

review_data.title: A quiet delight
review_data.content: I am surprised by the previous negative reviews, as I found this place to be one of great food and even better coffee. Having a quiche and coffee yesterday, I couldn't wait to return again today, for a fruit slice along with my coffee. Friendly...More

review_data.title: Snacks
review_data.content: The snacks here are very good and fresh.The espresso excellent. The service good.A good cafe atmosphere.

review_data.title: NO PICTURE PLEASE!
review_data.content: one from our group walk in to grab a bite and decided to snap a pic for FB checkin before order as we just walk out of hotel and the lady with a stern voice "NO PICTURE PLEASE" so she order food, not that we...More

review_data.title: At greencity, don’t go there!
review_data.content: Terrible experience. The staff completely ignored me. I was with my mom and my toddler, we were hungry and we had to leave the place because there was nobody taking our order, despite the fact the place was empty (no wonder). I will never come...More

review_data.title: Ein Hauch Skandinavien in Zürich
review_data.content: Der frisch zubereitete Sörland-Salat mit geräuchertem Lachs, lauwarmen Kartoffeln und einer cremigen Dill-Sauce ist was vom Besten, was ich in...More

review_data.title: Best Cafe with Varities
review_data.content: Many Varities and you can have different coffee. Fresh Crossiants and pastries.. Got a nice cappuccino and crossaints for breakkie. They also have premade sandwiches and other cold dishes.

review_data.title: Great place for quick eats
review_data.content: We stopped by because we needed a quick bite. They sell pre packaged food so we got the chicken cordon bleu wirth potatoes. If you eat there they will heat it up in about 5-10 minutes. The price is cheap compared to everything else in...More

review_data.title: Nur noch PEINLICH!
review_data.content: Wieder einmal bei Wüst heute: möchte einen Brotsack und ein Brot kaufen. Theke leer: Zwei! haben keine Zeit zum Bedienen,...More

review_data.title: Delicious Breakfast!
review_data.content: The place is nearby the train station and I was looking for a nice place for a coffee. But I found more than that and "had" to taste their products. The ambient has a nice interior design and atmosphere. The coffee is expensive (Zürich standards)....More

review_data.title: sehr unfreundlich und rassistisch SCHANDE
review_data.content: das personal ist seehr unhöflich unfreundlich und sogar rassistisch... nie wieder wüst... eine schande wie mit den kunden ihr umgeht...More

review_data.title: Great place for breakfast, lunch, snack & rest
review_data.content: Popped in here for breakfast as we arrived in Zurich much too early to check into our hotel. The range was great. The service friendly. The setting just what we needed to relax after 30 hours of travelling.

review_data.title: Café da manha

review_data.title: Raupe im Essen
review_data.content: Wir hatten eine lebende haarige Raupe im Salat (also nur in einem) und somit wollten wir die Salate wieder zurückbringen....More

review_data.title: Petit-déjeuner agréable
review_data.content: Cadre agréable et spacieux, petite terrasse sympathique et ombragée. N'avons pris que des petits-déjeuners mais ils servent toute la journée....More

review_data.title: Best cheese danish!
review_data.content: This was located close to our hotel. We had coffee and cheese danishes and yogurts in the morning. Very nice. Looked like they had good lunch items as well.
